Package org.appkit.widget

additional, useful widgets for SWT

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Datepicker for creating a component that is a DateTime
Datepicker.DateRange  
GridComposite for creating a component that is a Composite with a GridLayout
MBox A more sophisticated MessageBox.
Options Holds options for component and provides methods for working with.
RadioSet a component that uses multiple Buttons to form a radio-set
SaveFileDialog A FileDialog that asks for overwrite-confirmation if a file already exists.
Search for creating a component that aims to be a search-field
 

Enum Summary
